title: 26: OBITCH the leg-endary truffle butter...
description:
Hi Geoffs! This week we’re talking about the phenomenon of mushroom coffins, annoying things you have to do after a loved one dies, a scandalous obituary, one for an assman, and of course some dumb.ass.criminalllllls. 
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
BetterHelp: Visit betterhelp.com/obit for 10% off your first month! 
Olive & June: Visit oliveandjune.com/obit and use code ‘obit’ for 20% off your first Mani System! 
Sources: 
https://www.everplans.com/articles/the-three-different-types-of-green-cemeteries https://www.memorialplanning.com/blog/a-family-guide-to-eco-friendly-burials  https://www.bobhendrikx.com/loop  https://www.businessinsider.com.au/coffin-eco-friendly-mushrooms-mycelium-funerals-2021-3#:~:text=A%20coffin%20made%20from%20mushroom%20mycelium%20can%20biodegrade,burial.%20See%20more%20stories%20on%20Insider’s%20business%20page. https://www.cnn.com/2019/05/04/entertainment/luke-perry-mushroom-suit-trnd/index.html https://www.ted.com/talks/jae_rhim_lee_my_mushroom_burial_suit https://www.joincake.com/blog/mushroom-burial-suit/ https://www.nbcnews.com/news/weird-news/new-jersey-man-has-two-obituaries-one-wife-one-girlfriend-n624371 https://ringsssss.com/ohmy/man-spikes-his-goodbye-cake-at-work-with-laxatives-chaos-ensues-as-people-shit-everywhere/ https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2646082/One-woman-infestation-Rat-Girl-released-thousands-rodents-streets-San-Francisco-officials-say-theyre-powerless-stop-her.html https://www.quora.com/How-long-should-you-leave-a-dead-person-s-mobile-phone-on-for https://www.everplans.com/articles/the-infuriating-process-of-canceling-a-cell-phone-contract-after-someone-dies
See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
